name: @illuxdev/oxide
description: Create full-stack applications including, desktop, mobile, web, and servers!

scripts.watch:desktop-cli: cd desktop-cli && npm run watch && cd ../
scripts.watch:desktop-gui: cd desktop-gui && npm run watch && cd ../
scripts.watch:mobile-cli: cd mobile-cli && npm run watch && cd ../
scripts.watch:mobile-gui: cd mobile-gui && npm run watch && cd ../
scripts.watch:utils: cd utils && npm run watch && cd ../
scripts.watch:websocket: cd websocket && npm run watch && cd ../
scripts.watch:terminal: cd terminal && npm run watch && cd ../
scripts.watch:desktop-electron: cd desktop-electron && npm run watch && cd ../
scripts.watch: run-p watch:desktop-cli watch:desktop-gui watch:mobile-cli watch:mobile-gui watch:utils watch:websocket watch:terminal watch:desktop-electron
scripts.postinstall: run-p install:desktop-cli install:desktop-gui install:mobile-cli install:mobile-gui install:utils install:websocket install:terminal install:desktop-electron && npm run watch
